info.title: Swagger API Doc for Aladin Web Service
info.description: This is list of endpoints and documentations of REST API for Aladin Web Service

servers.description: Development server domain for profile aws
Development server domain for profile aws

tags.name: Welcome
tags.description: REST API endpoints for testing welcoming users

tags.name: Authenticate
tags.description: REST API endpoints for getting authenticate tokens and carry out specific authenticate actions

tags.name: Login
tags.description: REST API endpoints for login into system

tags.name: Register
tags.description: REST API endpoints for registering users via normal or google method

tags.name: Code confirmation
tags.description: REST API endpoints for confirming verification code (can not be used with Forgetting Password feature

tags.name: Password forgetting
tags.description: REST API endpoints for retrieving password when forgetting

tags.name: General User
tags.description: REST API endpoints for interacting with basic users (just be used for management purpose)

tags.name: Manager
tags.description: REST API endpoints for interacting with managers

tags.name: Student
tags.description: REST API endpoints for interacting with students

tags.name: Manager - Student
tags.description: REST API endpoints for managers to manage student accounts

tags.name: Teaching Assistant
tags.description: REST API endpoints for interacting with teaching assistants

tags.name: Manager - Teaching Assistant
tags.description: REST API endpoints for managers to manage TA accounts

tags.name: TA - Manager bank account
tags.description: REST API endpoints for managers and TAs to retrieve bank account info

tags.name: Institution
tags.description: REST API endpoints for interacting with institutions

tags.name: Major
tags.description: REST API endpoints for interacting with majors of institution

tags.name: Subject
tags.description: REST API endpoints for interacting with subjects

tags.name: Payment methods
tags.description: REST API endpoints for payment methods

tags.name: Fixed classroom
tags.description: REST API endpoints for fixed classroom info

tags.name: Fixed classroom - Student
tags.description: REST API endpoints for students to register studying fixed classroom

tags.name: Fixed classroom - Teaching Assistant
tags.description: REST API endpoints for TAs to register teaching fixed classroom

tags.name: Fixed classroom - Manager
tags.description: REST API endpoints for managers to manage fixed classroom

tags.name: Private group
tags.description: REST API endpoints for private group info

tags.name: Private group - Student
tags.description: REST API endpoints for students to register private group

tags.name: Private group - Teaching Assistant
tags.description: REST API endpoints for TAs to register teaching private group

tags.name: Private group - Manager
tags.description: REST API endpoints for managers to manage private group

get.summary: Get new Access token by Refresh token
get.description: Include refresh token as bearer token in request header to get new access token together with new refresh token

oldPassword.description: Can be omitted when using for forgetting password

subjectRegisters.description: This field is required when registering to be TA

referenceTAPhoneNumber.description: Not required when registering. When updating registration and updating TA info, this field cannot be used

SubjectRegister.description: This field is required when registering to be TA

institutionId.description: Only required when create new institution
Only required when create new major in an institution

majorId.description: Only required when create new subject

institutionId.description: When admin creates an account for user, if the role is not STU or TA, this field is default null
